name: Excavation (Benjamin Rowland)
description:
Take on the role of an archaeologist in this calming artifact restoration game. Use your tools to clean and restore various items to their former glory. Work under time pressure to complete as many as you can. Master your skills to maximize the rewards from each artifact.

For the best experience, please play in full screen mode. Note: tools apply to your cursor location. The presentation of the tools may differ among varying resolutions.

Jai Dodechani - 2D art, 3D models, UI design,  sound design

Ben Rowland - Gameplay programming, UI programming

Excavation is a relaxing restoration game created in Unity3D.
